question.text: The following are precautions taken in blood transfusions except

options.option: The blood must be < 7 days old

question.text: Which of the following is the main cause of transfusion associated deaths

options.option: Transfusion associated graft vrs host disease

question.text: Which of the following is not a physiological variation in platelet count

options.option: Africans have counts about 10-20% lower than Europeans
Platelet counts are approximately 20% higher in women and levels fall during menstruation
